mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT kct.class_timetable_days,kcst.schedule_title FROM k_class_timetable as kct join k_class_schedule_t kcst on kct.class_timetable_days = kcst.class_timetable_days order by 1

SELECT kct.class_timetable_id, kcm.class_id, ku.user_name,c.course_title, kct2.class_timetable_start, kct2.class_timetable_end, kct2.class_timetable_days, kct2.class_timetable_name, kr.room_building, kr.room_no FROM k_class_time kct join k_class_member kcm on kct.class_id = kcm.class_id join k_class kc on kc.class_id = kcm.class_id JOIN k_course c on c.course_id = kc.course_id join k_class_timetable kct2 on kct2.class_timetable_id = kct.class_timetable_id join k_users ku on ku.user_id = kc.prof_id join k_rooms kr on kr.room_id = kct.room_id
where kcm.stu_id = #{userId} order by kct2.class_timetable_code

SELECT t.schedule_title, kct.class_timetable_name,kct.class_timetable_id,kct2.class_id,t.class_timetable_days from k_class_time kct2 join k_class_timetable kct on kct2.class_timetable_id = kct.class_timetable_id join k_class_schedule_t t on kct.class_timetable_days = t.class_timetable_days order by class_id,class_timetable_id
